Biased Media

Media unfairly blames Islam for the killings of innocent human being by a so called “Muslims”. Media picks black sheep from the Muslim community and highlights it everywhere as if they were exemplary Muslims. This is 100% bigotry. Media journalist does not have knowledge of Islam and its beautiful teachings, but try to jump on to the out of context, cherry picked verses from the Holy Quran and the Sahih Hadith which suit their agenda.

Islam and the Prophet Muhammad (Peace be upon him) stands against terrorism of any form and against extremism of any kind. Those things have no place in Islam at all.

Holy Quran states :

Whoever kills a soul unless for a soul or for corruption [done] in the land – it is as if he had slain mankind entirely.And whoever saves one – it is as if he had saved mankind entirely. Holy Quran 5:32 Quran

As per the above verse it doesn’t matter if he is a Muslim or not. If you kill any innocent human being then it is as if you have killed the whole of humanity. If you saved any human being whether he is Muslim or not, it is as if you have saved the whole of humanity.

How can there be for the polytheists a treaty in the sight of Allah and with His Messenger, except for those with whom you made a treaty at al-Masjid al-Haram?

So as long as they are upright toward you, be upright toward them. Indeed, Allah loves the righteous [who fear Him].Quran
